text: mariyu e pravakta kuda vijayadhanam (buti) koraku nam'maka drohaniki palpadadu. Mariyu nam'makadrohaniki palpadinavadu punarut'thana dinamuna tana nam'maka drohanto patu hajaravutadu. Appudu prati praniki tanu arjincina daniki purti pratiphalam ivvabadutundi mariyu varikelanti an'yayam jarugadu
